com.i2group.apollo.alertfeedservice

Interface IAlertFeedService


  • public interface IAlertFeedService
    A set of methods for creating, subscribing to, and unsubscribing from alert feeds.
    Since:
    3.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AlertFeedAndSubscriptionToken createAlertFeed(String sessionId, String alertFeedName, String alertFeedDescription, ItemIdentifier subjectIdentifier, List<SecurityAccessPermission> securityAccessPermissions, List<SecurityGrantPermission> securityGrantPermissions, String securityPermissionsSignpost, List<String> alertTypes, List<AlertDeliveryMechanism> alertDeliveryMechanisms)
      Deprecated. 
      Call createAlertFeed2 instead.
      AlertFeedAndSubscriptionToken createAlertFeed2(String sessionId, String alertFeedName, String alertFeedDescription, ItemIdentifier subjectIdentifier, SecurityDefinition securityDefinition, List<String> alertTypes, List<AlertDeliveryMechanism> alertDeliveryMechanisms)
      Creates an alert feed with for the Item with the specified ItemIdentifier (and, optionally, for any Items in the set owned by that Item).
      List<AlertFeedAndSubscriptionToken> subscribeCurrentUserToAlertFeeds(String sessionId, List<ItemIdentifier> alertFeedIdentifiers, List<AlertDeliveryMechanism> alertDeliveryMechanisms)
      Subscribes the current user to the alert feeds with the specified ItemIdentifiers.
      void unsubscribeCurrentUserFromAlertFeeds(String sessionId, List<String> subscriptionTokens)
      Unsubscribes the current user from the alert feeds with the specified subscription tokens.

    • Method Detail

      • createAlertFeed

        @Deprecated
AlertFeedAndSubscriptionToken createAlertFeed(String sessionId,
                                                           String alertFeedName,
                                                           String alertFeedDescription,
                                                           ItemIdentifier subjectIdentifier,
                                                           List<SecurityAccessPermission> securityAccessPermissions,
                                                           List<SecurityGrantPermission> securityGrantPermissions,
                                                           String securityPermissionsSignpost,
                                                           List<String> alertTypes,
                                                           List<AlertDeliveryMechanism> alertDeliveryMechanisms)
                                                    throws ValidationException,
                                                           DataSourceOutOfDateException,
                                                           ItemNotFoundException,
                                                           AccessPermissionDeniedException,
                                                           GrantPermissionDeniedException
        Deprecated. Call createAlertFeed2 instead.
        Creates an alert feed with for the Item with the specified ItemIdentifier (and, optionally, for any Items in the set owned by that Item).
        Parameters:
        sessionId - A String containing the client's session ID.
        alertFeedName - A String containing a human-readable name for the new alert feed. This name is used when listing alert feeds in a user interface, for example.
        alertFeedDescription - A String containing a description of the new alert feed.
        subjectIdentifier - The ItemIdentifier of the Item for which the the alert feed is being created.
        securityAccessPermissions - The SecurityAccessPermissions for the new alert feed.
        securityGrantPermissions - The SecurityGrantPermissions for the new alert feed.
        securityPermissionsSignpost - A String indicating whom to contact to obtain increased SecurityAccessPermissions for the new alert feed.
        alertTypes - Strings indicating the circumstances under which the new alert feed will generate alerts. Valid Strings here are the identifiers of the LogicalType.BOOLEAN PropertyTypes defined for the EntityType named "Alert Feed" in the current Schema.
        alertDeliveryMechanisms - The AlertDeliveryMechanisms by which the current user should subscribe to the new alert feed. If this is null or empty then the alert feed is created with no subscribers.
        Returns:
        An AlertFeedAndSubscriptionToken for the newly created alert feed.
        Throws:
        ValidationException - If a general validation error occurs.
        DataSourceOutOfDateException - If the specified ItemIdentifier refers to a DataSource whose version number is out of date.
        ItemNotFoundException - If the specified ItemIdentifier identifies an Item that does not exist or has been purged.
        AccessPermissionDeniedException - If the SecurityAccessPermissions provided for the new alert feed would not give the current user at least the READ_ONLY access level.
        GrantPermissionDeniedException - If the SecurityGrantPermissions provided for the new alert feed would not give the current user the UPDATE grant level.

      • createAlertFeed2

        AlertFeedAndSubscriptionToken createAlertFeed2(String sessionId,
                                               String alertFeedName,
                                               String alertFeedDescription,
                                               ItemIdentifier subjectIdentifier,
                                               SecurityDefinition securityDefinition,
                                               List<String> alertTypes,
                                               List<AlertDeliveryMechanism> alertDeliveryMechanisms)
                                        throws ValidationException,
                                               DataSourceOutOfDateException,
                                               ItemNotFoundException,
                                               AccessPermissionDeniedException,
                                               GrantPermissionDeniedException
        Creates an alert feed with for the Item with the specified ItemIdentifier (and, optionally, for any Items in the set owned by that Item).
        Parameters:
        sessionId - A String containing the client's session ID.
        alertFeedName - A String containing a human-readable name for the new alert feed. This name is used when listing alert feeds in a user interface, for example.
        alertFeedDescription - A String containing a description of the new alert feed.
        subjectIdentifier - The ItemIdentifier of the Item for which the the alert feed is being created.
        securityDefinition - The SecurityDefinition for the new alert feed.
        alertTypes - Strings indicating the circumstances under which the new alert feed will generate alerts. Valid Strings here are the identifiers of the LogicalType.BOOLEAN PropertyTypes defined for the EntityType named "Alert Feed" in the current Schema.
        alertDeliveryMechanisms - The AlertDeliveryMechanisms by which the current user should subscribe to the new alert feed. If this is null or empty then the alert feed is created with no subscribers.
        Returns:
        An AlertFeedAndSubscriptionToken for the newly created alert feed.
        Throws:
        ValidationException - If a general validation error occurs.
        DataSourceOutOfDateException - If the specified ItemIdentifier refers to a DataSource whose version number is out of date.
        ItemNotFoundException - If the specified ItemIdentifier identifies an Item that does not exist or has been purged.
        AccessPermissionDeniedException - If the SecurityAccessPermissions provided for the new alert feed would not give the current user at least the READ_ONLY access level.
        GrantPermissionDeniedException - If the SecurityGrantPermissions provided for the new alert feed would not give the current user the UPDATE grant level.

      • subscribeCurrentUserToAlertFeeds

        List<AlertFeedAndSubscriptionToken> subscribeCurrentUserToAlertFeeds(String sessionId,
                                                                     List<ItemIdentifier> alertFeedIdentifiers,
                                                                     List<AlertDeliveryMechanism> alertDeliveryMechanisms)
                                                              throws ValidationException,
                                                                     DataSourceOutOfDateException,
                                                                     ItemNotFoundException,
                                                                     AccessPermissionDeniedException
        Subscribes the current user to the alert feeds with the specified ItemIdentifiers. Any attempt to subscribe to an alert feed to which the user is already subscribed is silently ignored.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - A String containing the client's session ID.
        alertFeedIdentifiers - The ItemIdentifiers of the alert feeds to which the current user will subscribe.
        alertDeliveryMechanisms - The AlertDeliveryMechanisms by which the current user should subscribe to the alert feeds. This must not be empty.
        Returns:
        AlertFeedAndSubscriptionTokens that characterize the new subscription relationships.
        Throws:
        ValidationException - If a general validation error occurs.
        ItemNotFoundException - If a specified ItemIdentifier identifies an alert feed that does not exist, or that the current user cannot see.
        DataSourceOutOfDateException - If a specified ItemIdentifier refers to a DataSource whose version number is out of date.
        AccessPermissionDeniedException - If the current user does not have at least READ_ONLY access to the alert feed.

      • unsubscribeCurrentUserFromAlertFeeds

        void unsubscribeCurrentUserFromAlertFeeds(String sessionId,
                                          List<String> subscriptionTokens)
                                   throws ValidationException
        Unsubscribes the current user from the alert feeds with the specified subscription tokens.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - A String containing the client's session ID.
        subscriptionTokens - Strings characterizing the subscription relationships between the user and alert feeds that this method will break.
        Throws:
        ValidationException - If any of the subscription tokens do not represent alert feeds to which the current user is subscribed.
